website_summaries.verdict: Nice thick rubber on this reliable overshoe.
pros: Keeps your dress shoes dry in the rain
Thicker rubber construction than lower-priced models
Shoe has a little stretch to it to make it easier to put on and take off
cons: Buy these big, as they tend to run a little small

customer_reviews.title: Buy one size larger than your shoe size
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 11 shoe. I ordered the XL size to fit size 11 - 13 medium. The overshoe was one size too small when I tried it on. It did not fit in the heel and was very tight. When you buy these overshoes you need to put the toe part on first and really pull as much as you can to try and stretch it out so that it will cover the heel part of your shoe. My shoes have thick soles and did not fit. However, if the soles of the shoe were relatively thin, then it might have fit.
customer_reviews.author: S. Freud

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am glad I went with these. I thought about spending $80 on some other name brand ones but these fit the bill and work as expected! I followed what the other reviewers said I wear a size 9 shoe so I went with the Large.
customer_reviews.author: G. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I am a 52 year old professional male who wears size 10 D-width Allen Edmonds dress shoes. The large size fit over my shoes perfectly, and slipped on with little to no effort. These are perfect for helping to protect my expensive dress shoes from the Pacific Northwest winter weather.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Frances

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and efficient overshoes
customer_reviews.text: These are the first rubber overshoes of this kind, that I've bought, that fit. They don't seem to stretch as advertised. I had mediums, that were supposed to be appropriate to my shoe size (9 to 9-1/2), but I had to go to extra large to find a pair that fit. Now that I've found a good fit, I like the overshoes very much. They seem sturdy and designed to provide very good protection.I definitely give them five stars for that! And I don't think that the size issue is peculiar to this brand, because I had some others that were a different brand, and had the same problem. Maybe it's me??
customer_reviews.author: David H.

customer_reviews.title: Ugly as hell, but they do what they promise ...
customer_reviews.text: Ugly as hell, but they do what they promise. I need to keep a pair in my briefcase during the rainy season in Mexico City (thunderstorms everyday starting at 5pm). The soles seem durable enough to last for a while. My only complaints are: they leave the tops of your shoes exposed to rain (i.e. suede oxfords will still get ruined) and they are heavy and take-up a lot of space in my briefcase.
customer_reviews.author: austin murphy

customer_reviews.title: Runs Small
customer_reviews.text: These overshoes do a great job protecting your shoes against the elements. I wouldn’t recommend wearing these all of the time. I keep a pair of these at the office for days it rains unexpectedly and another pair at home when I need to wear nice shoes to the office on a rainy day. I live in NYC where the streets and sidewalks are heavily salted before and after snow and these work well to protect the leather soles of my dress shoes. A note on sizing, for most of my shoes, these run small. I’d recommend sizing up when ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Enrique L.

customer_reviews.title: Great to protect your footwear!
customer_reviews.text: These are great for slipping over sneakers/boots/casual shoes to protect them from mud or add traction for snow. We used to use these over our show (riding) boots at horse shows and they were fantastic! Show boots don't offer the best traction on mud/snow and these added the traction we needed and also added some shock absorption as we walked around the barn (on concrete, mud, snow and poop) and they held up great!! Get a pair to keep in your car/truck for days when you wish you had worn boots!
customer_reviews.author: HollyJ

customer_reviews.title: Extremely practical, cheap, and not too bad looking
customer_reviews.text: I keep these in my work backpack everyday, stuffed in a 3L stuff sack; they're light enough and well worth the space for the added freedom and peace of mind. The tall sides and tongue and the sturdy tread of these galoshes provide fairly good coverage in the rain and when walking through puddles. The XX-Large fits nice and snug over my size 12 shoes. Are galoshes cool? They're a whole lot cooler than ruined dress shoes, or lugging around rain boots. The professional style is much better looking than most other options. Great for the price. Model: Black,XX-Large /13-14 M US (be sure to size up)
customer_reviews.author: A Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Ugly, but good for the price and utility
customer_reviews.text: These are good, utilitarian shoe rubbers. They are by zero definitions stylish. In fact they look pretty ugly when worn with dress pants or a suit. But when its raining outside, nobody is probably checking out your shoes anyway, so might as well stay dry. My only complaint is that in a true downpour, the little slits on this shoe rubber (to the right and left of the top of the laces) allow a little part of your shoe to get wet. Its not a deal breaker, but I would prefer the shoe to be 100% covered than have those little areas getting soaked. But for the price it's hard to beat.
customer_reviews.author: amber143

customer_reviews.title: Best over-shoe I've found
customer_reviews.text: Way better than the other brand. The rubber is thicker, and they are sized so that I don't actually have to stretch them much to get them on my size 12/13 dress shoes. The other brand (a well-known one) that I got several pairs of, the largest they offered was XL, and I had to stretch them. Consequently, they would wear out by "tearing out" after a year or so. These don't seem susceptible to that because I could get them in a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Matt P.

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I was looking for. They fit perfectly! I wear a 10 1/2 shoe but got the extra large 11-13 after reading many reviews saying to up to the next size. Shipping was on time. Packaging was good and could also be used for a return if you needed it. They feel well made, and stretch well. I can get them on and off easily. Very good traction on the sole. No foul odors. Now, I just need to see how long they will last. Based on my initial assessment I think they will last for a long time. Overall, from begining to the end, I am extremely please with all who were involved with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Big pappy

customer_reviews.title: Nice, heavy-duty rubber
customer_reviews.text: I previously had a pair of rain overshoes made by Totes. They were adequate, but hard to put on and eventually the rubber ripped. These by Tingley are much heavier-duty and easier to put on and off. I suspect they'll last a long time. My shoe size is 9.5. I ordered size 10, which fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. M.

customer_reviews.title: No returns?
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed in the product quality, as they were far bigger than anticipated and higher over the top of the foot, making them a trip hazard. I am now stuck with a pair of these that are useless to me as they could not be returned. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: J. N.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, solid construction.
customer_reviews.text: My shoe size is 10.5 US and I got the 2xL size, knowing they ran small. It is the right size to go over a regular 10.5 shoe or sneaker. It has some extra room in the front, so a size 11 could be a perfect match.. Drawback is that the shoe bottom is not as "grippy" on a wet surface as the sole and heel of the shoes it is to protect! The pair weights perhaps a pound or so, and fold up for travel. You can purchase much lighter weight, thinner shoe covers... however if you want endurance over light weight, these would be the better choice.
customer_reviews.author: I. Seligman

customer_reviews.title: Surprised
customer_reviews.text: Much more stylish than I thought they would be. My wife was extremely skeptical too, until she saw them on a shoe. This size, L (which is confusing as it lists Mens US 9.5-11 & Womens US 8-9.5... and women's sizes are clearly not "smaller" than men's), fits over my Cole Haan US Men's 10.5 leather-soled oxfords perfectly. I've tried it on 3 different pairs (cap-toe, split-toe, and some stylized-toe version) and it fits all shoes snugly.
customer_reviews.author: yep-ok

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for keeping dress shoes dry
customer_reviews.text: Had to wear a suit and dress shoes for a court hearing on a really rainy day. These were easy to slip onto my shoe and kept my feet dry. They weren't too heavy or clunky. They do slip a little bit, so step carefully.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and durable
customer_reviews.text: bought these has a present for my partner and they are exactly what I wanted them to be very hard to find anything like this online and I'm so glad Amazon has it they fit exactly as they are supposed to and easily pack away when not using them
customer_reviews.author: shane

customer_reviews.title: This is a perfect fit for a full size width shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect fit for a full size width shoe. There are others that are meant for dress shoes but not this one. This is practical as it covers up the shoe all the way up to the top of the laces. There is a good shape on the bottom that fits the heel of the shoe comfortably. This can be worn all day over the shoe as it has a neat snug look. Excellent for the low snow days and for rainy days. If my review has been helpful to you please let me know by clicking on the yes button below
customer_reviews.author: reviewer

customer_reviews.title: great to use
customer_reviews.text: My son uses these for the office. The walk from the parking garage to the office is full of running water and slush sometimes. These help keep his feet dry and shoes looking nice
customer_reviews.author: Sidecar50

customer_reviews.title: because I was not mindful of that fact so I ended up paying the cost of returning them for the proper care
customer_reviews.text: I will give the product five stars the quality was good and it fit my tennis shoes well. However shap this particular one does not cover a tennis shoe very well. So for your own benefit being mindful of the shape and style of your shoe before you order a pair of these to make sure that they covers much of the shoe as possible .because I was not mindful of that fact so I ended up paying the cost of returning them for the proper care
customer_reviews.author: amazon  shopper

customer_reviews.title: It fits well.
customer_reviews.text: Liked that it was not difficult to put on and it fit well. Not sloppy. Looked pretty good for tthe his type of product. Definitely looked and felt like quality construction.
customer_reviews.author: Drob631

customer_reviews.title: A heavyweight rubber overshoe
customer_reviews.text: These are basic rubber overshoes and not designed for looks, as you can tell from the images. Though once they are on your shoes, they kind of blend in. They look big and the size says they fit up to size 15, but they were a struggle to get on over my size 12 Rockport shoes. Someone on Amazon suggested spraying the insides with some silicone, which did help a lot. They did not grip as well as I had hoped in this year's snow, but I suppose they are really intended for heavy rains.
customer_reviews.author: Phil-S

customer_reviews.title: keeps leather shoes dry!
customer_reviews.text: as designed, I wear these to keep my expensive dress shoes dry in wet weather. Particularly if you have leather soles! good and solid, not cheap thin ones....thick. Strongly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Don Ryng

customer_reviews.title: Easy trade off
customer_reviews.text: They fit as indicated in the size chart. I wear a men's 10 and ordered the LG. I was tired of eitherbthrowing out my leather shoes every winter or spending a week soaking them white vinegar and saddle soap to try to get the salt stains out. Now intake 5 seconds to slip these over my shoes. Easy trade off, highly recommended, especially if you wear nice shoes and live in an area that salts heavily in the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Thadd Mcgaffey

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with item, although good to size up
customer_reviews.text: I liked that this product: • Was not made in China (Made in Mexico) • Made from natural rubber • Covers more than other overshoes • Has a grippy tread • Stretches just enough to get it on over your shoe I wear a size 11 and I got the 11-13 size and fits perfectly. I wouldn't necessarily want anything smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew C. Christiansen

customer_reviews.title: Size runs small
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 9 shoe and the medium size just about fit...it was tight but I finally got it to fit. The size M would NEVER fit a size 10 or 11 shoe as the ad says.
customer_reviews.author: Bill D

customer_reviews.title: UK SIZED! Buy one size higher in your range if USA
customer_reviews.text: I like the product but it came stamped as "large". The Amazon website listed "9.5-11" which I ordered. UK product so our "9.5" here in the States in their "9". I bought another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Denvillian

customer_reviews.title: Too tight.
customer_reviews.text: These are too narrow and too tight to fit easily over my size 12 Medium Merrell Jungle Mocs. These are my comfortable slip-ons for airline travel. I bought these overshoes for a three day weekend in NYC in January just in case the ground was wet with slush. They can be forced over my shoes with the shoe off my foot which is inconvenient but they will work if I have to use them. They might work on thin low dress shoes in the 11 D size. Anyway, if they work for three days and keep my feet dry in the street I will be happy.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond K. Poplar

customer_reviews.title: Good Product but does not run true to size
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing wrong with the product -- the design looks right and the rubber material is robust. . But -- I bought a XXL which is supposed to fit a size 13/14 D shoe. I wear a 13 Narrow and it was not even close to fitting. This is the second different shoe rain/snow shoe cover -- both said they should fit but as I said, not even close
customer_reviews.author: Otis Plato

customer_reviews.title: SIZE ALERT !!!
customer_reviews.text: After reading several reviews of this and other brand's overshoes, I decided to purchase the size XL instead of L. I normally wear a size 9 1/2 men's shoe. I already had 2 pairs of size L overshoes which were extremely difficult to get on over my shoes. The size XL I ordered worked perfectly. So I would recommend that you order the next size up.
customer_reviews.author: Skipper 68

customer_reviews.title: They are of good quality.
customer_reviews.text: They are hard to put on my shoes. There of very good equality. I'm hoping that after some use they will be more flexible and will be easier to put on my shoes. My opinion is that they are good quality. I'm satisfied with the product as is and am hoping after use they will be easier to put on my shoes when needed.
customer_reviews.author: gmcjoe

customer_reviews.title: To the purpose
customer_reviews.text: Friends, they are galoshes. They don't need to fit like a shoe, they need to be snug so as to keep on your shoes and keep them dry. If you bought the wrong size, ask for an exchange, but you won't be happy if they are too big.
customer_reviews.author: Wilton Block

customer_reviews.title: Excellent rubbers
customer_reviews.text: Very good heavy duty rubbers that I have worn for over a year with my dress shoes. Unlike many competitors, these rubbers do not immediately tear or wear out. When these wear down, I will be ordering another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Ernie

customer_reviews.title: These were great!
customer_reviews.text: I've had covers in the past that were just a little too snug and were difficult to get on and off. I needed the shoes to be just a little bit larger to cover my dress shoes. These were perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Frederick E Hairston Jr

customer_reviews.title: Too small for size 12
customer_reviews.text: I think these are great.... in concept. I would say that I ordered the XL which states that it fits 11-13. I am a 12 and thought that I would not want the extra material of a XXL but I shouldn't have second guessed my self. The XL is just too tight, not allowing the shoe to fit in the heel. I do have wider feet, however the shoes I tried these in were just regular width (though I may have stretched it out). They are replacing these with the next size up, will update at that time.
customer_reviews.author: johnnybig

customer_reviews.title: Fits Well, Protects Your Valuable Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I wear these with dress shoes. They fit perfectly, and I can put them on and remove them with little effort.
customer_reviews.author: Eric B. Simms

customer_reviews.title: Best alternative to rain boots.
customer_reviews.text: Great Product and great to keep at your desk or can carry in your bag. best alternative to rain boots.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.DNYC

customer_reviews.title: It fits well (+one size)
customer_reviews.text: As per recommendations from other postings the order was for overshoes that are one size over the shoe size. The fit is very good. The x-large/11-13 overshoe fits well over a Red Wing Beckman Oxford 10.0D.
customer_reviews.author: jgme

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for muddy parking lot!
customer_reviews.text: I park in a dirt lot that gets a bit muddy when it rains. These work perfectly to keep my dress shoes clean. I highly recommend purchasing these overshoes.
customer_reviews.author: jaylweb

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This overshoe is just what I needed! Given the lousy winter, and very wet Spring we experienced inChicago, it was the perfect way to save by dress shoes from rain, sleet and salt, and not have to deal with big bulky boots. I went with the 2XL size, to avoid having to squeeze into the overshoe, and make taking them off less of a chore. I generally wear a size 11.5, and they are a tad large, but still manage to stay on,without much slippage. If you wear a size 12, these would be perfect, otherwise i might recommend getting the XLs
customer_reviews.author: Wooglin

customer_reviews.title: They were easy to take on and off and give me good ...
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised to find that these fit perfectly over my size 12 dress shoes. They were easy to take on and off and give me good traction when I'm wearing them. This is a really great option for the upcoming rainy season and I prefer it over various sprays or leather treatments for your dress shoes. For protecting expensive dress shoes these are a fantastic deal.
customer_reviews.author: NK

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but sizes are too variable
customer_reviews.text: If you take a size 11, order the next size up. I believe the size I purchase covered sizes 9 to 11... I spend more time trying to get these on and off then I do using them

customer_reviews.title: Much too small
customer_reviews.text: I bought size 13-14 boots to wear over my size 13 standard street shoes. The boots are a full 2 inches too short to fit. No amount of effort could stretch them over my heels.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Dimmitt

customer_reviews.title: XXL for Mens 11 4E
customer_reviews.text: I wear 11 4E dress, running, and walking shoes and the XXL fitted all the models that I tried them on. Did not comment on length of time wearing them comfortably or arch support since these are over shoes and I am not wearing them for long stretches of time. I need to wear them to get from building to building and do not work outdoors so I do not have them on for more than a few minutes at a time.
customer_reviews.author: d double-u

customer_reviews.title: I recently started riding the bus to work (in rainy ...
customer_reviews.text: I recently started riding the bus to work (in rainy Seattle) and though they look ridiculous they do the job. Can't over emphasize enough how small they are - I got a size bigger than my shoe size and they are still a struggle to stretch over my sneakers . I will go 1.5 sizes bigger next time and report back.
customer_reviews.author: Debora Baily

customer_reviews.title: Sizes are off!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the size that was supposed to fit me 2xl and it was waaaaaaay too big; i'm a size 12.5 shoe which is what the sizing chart recommends. So then i switched to just the xl, which based on the sizing chart, should be too small for me. That size was also to big for me. The XL overshoes are always on the verge of slipping off any of my size 12.5 dress shoes. Now I'm stuck with the XL size because I waited too long to try and return them! The quality is good, but the size chart is ridiculous. I should have tried the L size.
customer_reviews.author: MapleSpartan

customer_reviews.title: Met my needs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to fit over tennis shoes for walking and it fits. Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SLB

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad I took the time to read the reviews
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I took the time to read the reviews. These things run small and I ordered the next size up. I wear a size 8.5 shoe. Realistically, I should have ordered a medium if they were true to shoe size. However, all the reviews said they run small so I ordered the large (9.5-11) and they fit my shoes perfectly. I can't imagine trying to stretch a medium over the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Skip Grayson

customer_reviews.title: Great protection in snow/rain
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 12 shoe, and walk a fair distance to work. With dress shoes being fairly expensive, I didn't want to expose them to salt, snow, or puddles of rainwater. So, this is a great solution. I find that my traction is better in the snow, and my shoes stay dry, with the leather soles lasting longer because of it. The XXL was required for my size 12s, and they do fit perfectly for that.
customer_reviews.author: Luc S

customer_reviews.title: Watch out the sizing.
customer_reviews.text: It was way smaller than expected. So much so that the next (and largest) I'm sure would still be too small. I thrashed the package opening it and IT was also supposed to be the returns package so I feel screwed... Anyway I guess I'll give it to my 13 year old kid so not a total loss. Otherwise I suspect the product is just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Russill

customer_reviews.title: Shoe Covers Have Held Up Very Well
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these shoe covers for over two years and they are terrific. They expand and contract nicely to cover soles on different kinds of shoes. They are sturdy rubber and have never cracked or leaked. I always feel comfortable wearing them knowing that I'll be dry. I greatly prefer them over Totes.
customer_reviews.author: T. Youngs

customer_reviews.title: Hubby loves these
customer_reviews.text: he got some for Christmas. Says they fit nice covering over his shoes and work well.
customer_reviews.author: Cinnamon

customer_reviews.title: Seems good.
customer_reviews.text: My shoe is 9.5. This product is advertised as fitting 9.5 to 11. If you wear a 10 you'd probably best get the next bigger size. Seems to be a quality product. About 5 ounces heavier than the old Totes that go to the ankle.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph P. Addante

customer_reviews.title: Dry shoes and no fear of rain
customer_reviews.text: The product is excellent as we travel a lot and I don’t have to carry heavy gore Tex hiking boots. This is actually my second pair as I lost the first one in some European hotel.
customer_reviews.author: Sami Weir

customer_reviews.title: Fits great over my size 9 sneakers.
customer_reviews.text: Easy on and easy off. Saves your shoes and I can easily remove them before entering a house or office. It bugs me when I have to remove my shoes at a home and these eliminate the need.
customer_reviews.author: John C.

customer_reviews.title: too tight?
customer_reviews.text: If they are too tight, try a little talcum powder around the inside to help the shoes fit.
customer_reviews.author: W. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my shoes dry. What else can you ask?
customer_reviews.text: I wear these over running shoes. Nobody makes rubbers designed to go over running shoes so find ones that do takes some luck. These are technically bigger than I should wear for my shoe size but it's what I had to buy to get them to fit over my running shoes. I also use a plastic bag over my shoes to get them to slide into these rubbers more easily. They do the trick for those rainy days in Ohio.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... had my Tingleys for a couple months now and like them quite a bit
customer_reviews.text: I've had my Tingleys for a couple months now and like them quite a bit. They go on and off over my shoes easily, fit as expected, and have kept my shoes clean and dry in both rain and snow. The only reason I gave these 3 stars is because the traction isn't great, especially in slush/snow. I know they're not meant to replace winter boots, but you WILL slip and slide around if you use these in any kind of wintry precipitation.
customer_reviews.author: VoraciousReader

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Needed
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 11 shoe and the extra large (noted for size 11 thru 13 shoe) fit perfectly. The material is very durable and pretty easy to get on and off. These are exactly what I needed! Note: The extra large as mentioned fits perfectly for my size 11 shoe, but I think the difficulty of getting on and off of larger shoes could be significantly greater.
customer_reviews.author: Mike169

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with these rubber overshoes. These items were exactly what I needed to protect my dress shoes while walking to and from my car in the rain/sleet/snow of Michigan. The extra lip that covers the laces is a nice touch as well. I am glad I paid a few extra dollars compared to other brands of overshoes - these are certainly more durable, nicer-looking, and easy to slip on that overshoes that some of my coworkers own. After reading other reviews on this site, I decided to select a size larger. I went with an XL, which the description says is for men's sizes 11-12. The overshoes fit my men's size 9.5 shoes perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Still

customer_reviews.title: Good overshoes.
customer_reviews.text: Great overshoes. Easy to put on and take off and weather proof.
customer_reviews.author: VonBek98

customer_reviews.title: The "tight fit" provides an exercise.
customer_reviews.text: I use the over shoe rubbers over "inside" shoes to step outside to get the mail or bring items to the compost pile or other quick matters. The stretch factor of the product means that it takes time to put on and take off. My prior over shoe rubbers tended to slip on but had outlived their useful service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good protection for dress shoes...
customer_reviews.text: Fits over dress shoes very well. The sole has good traction. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Save your good leather shoes
customer_reviews.text: This is what you want when you have to wear dress shoes with slosh on the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Jonas

customer_reviews.title: Simple, Comfy Solution for Rainy Days
customer_reviews.text: We were scheduled to take a two-week vacation in a rainy area when I ordered these overshoes for my husband. He had tried several waterproof low boots without liking any of them. In desperation, I ordered these galoshes (as we called them when we were children). He was pleased and planned to use them, but the trip was canceled, so we aren't sure if he will really enjoy stomping in puddles in these overshoes, but we are hopeful.
customer_reviews.author: Farmer Jeanio

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, Size Runs Small
customer_reviews.text: As other people have posted, these run very small. I wear a size 10 4E shoe. I previously had purchased a Tingley large and it didn't come close to fitting. The 2XL will barely squeeze over my shoes. On the positive side, these are very well made and should be quite durable. However, if you have a wide foot buy them larger than your shoe size, and the fit is going to depend on the style of shoe you wear.
customer_reviews.author: Frank J.

customer_reviews.title: Sizing runs small
customer_reviews.text: The overshoe is well made, but is apparently designed to fit your typical dress shoe. I purchased the XL size which is supposed to fit size 11 - 13 shoes, and found that they will not accommodate a size 10.5 to 12 walking shoe or boot. So if you're buying them for that type of shoe, you should probably go at least one size larger.
customer_reviews.author: William Minor

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Overshoes!
customer_reviews.text: Fit exactly as I expected, and added a nice grip to my dress shoes while on the job site. The rubber treading underneath was a particularly nice touch as my normal dress shoes have leather soles which don't provide much traction.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Perfet for Allen Edmonds
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to protect my Park Avenue Cap-toe Oxfords from Allen Edmonds. I must say these are better then i expected! I have a 9.5 D Park Avenue Cap-toe Oxfords and the Large fit perfect. The covers stretch out very well. I can imagine they will fit perfect for shoes at are size 11. They grip well in snowy conditions. I mostly use these in the snow to and from the parking lot of work. Thats about a 40meter walk to and from everyday.
customer_reviews.author: RandomITGUY

customer_reviews.title: Im really happy with these
customer_reviews.text: Im really happy with these. The fit was great. I ordered my normal size that I wear in regular shoes, and the fit over top was perfect. They are durable, and have a nice amount of material on the bottom that I do not believe I will wear out. I would buy them again. It is preserving my nice work shoes in the rain and slush and salt. I wear them right into the office, then take them off and keep them under my desk. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Joe C.

customer_reviews.title: XXL (12.5 to 14) too small for my fat 13EEEE Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Hi, All, I think the quality of these Tingley overshoes is great...but the Size XXL (12.5 to 14) is too small to fit over my 13EEEE dress shoes. (Note: My dress-shoes are not large soled wingtips, but have pretty much standard size heels and soles). However, I purchase a pair of the 10 inch tall Tingley overshoes in XXXL, and those slip on and off my 13EEEE dress shoes much more easily....so the 10 inch it is! Robt.
customer_reviews.author: JustAFilmGuy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Sizing
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure about the comments that these run small. I have worn size 13 most of my life and the XXL (13-15) fit perfectly over normal dress shoes. They would easily fit at least one size bigger if not two like advertised. Maybe the issues are with big, bulky tennis shoes? The quality seems good; I really like the reinforcement at the back of the heel.
customer_reviews.author: Grandpa Marty

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: These overshoes are very handy. I have trouble finding boots that are comfortable. The overshoes allow me to wear comfortable shoes and negotiate wintry conditions in Wisconsin.
customer_reviews.author: Robert B. Miller

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Made for pointed toe dress shoes. Does not work with round toe shoes.
customer_reviews.author: RAD

customer_reviews.title: These have been life (shoe) savers! They've save my ...
customer_reviews.text: These have been life (shoe) savers! They've save my behind a few times when I found myself in an icy parking lot with leather soled shoes as they provide just the right amount of added traction and also keep the shoes protected in the meantime. I'd actually buy a second pair just to keep in the office if it wasn't so close to the end of the season!
customer_reviews.author: EDtheITguy

customer_reviews.title: way too small
customer_reviews.text: The description claims to fit size 11 men's shoes but they must have tested on women's shoes. These are way too small and way too narrow to fit much of anything 10+. Also, I would not recommend them for rain as water will just accumulate in the overshoe. They're okay for snow or a light drizzle, but anything else and you might just use plastic grocery bags.
customer_reviews.author: AMK

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: The galoshes arrived within the time period indicated. Love the thickness of the rubber...its exactly what I was looking for. I bought the large size. They fit snugly over my shoes as they should. The price is fair. Retail stores either sold them at exorbitant prices or never heard of them. Can't wait to wear them in the rain! I liked them so much I bought another pair!!!
customer_reviews.author: Henrietta Hodge

customer_reviews.title: Flexible  with perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: This overshoe was flexible so it could fit over several different sizes of shoes without difficulty (Sizes of the shoes tend to vary from manufacturer as do the width of some of the shoes. This overshoe fit perfectly and all of them due to its flexibility)
customer_reviews.author: John Q

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Ripped first use. Do not buy, waste of money. Arrived on time , tried to use the first big storm and one of the shoes ripped in half. Complete defect and now I am stuck with this terrible product.
customer_reviews.author: simon

customer_reviews.title: This is such a cool concept!
customer_reviews.text: Borrowed these from some hosts I stayed with when there was slushy snow on the ground. They look like my actual shoes and my feet stayed dry so I decided to order my own pair 😁
customer_reviews.author: Vladislav Zakharov

customer_reviews.title: Not to forget to mention that they wear out pretty quickly (I walk around a lot in Boston)
customer_reviews.text: Put these on for the first time over a brand new pair of black Park Avenue Allen Edmonds... And they scuffed my AE's everywhere. Not to forget to mention that they wear out pretty quickly (I walk around a lot in Boston). However, they do keep my shoes protected from the snow and rain for the most part. I also don't like how there is a part of the shoe that is still exposed, maybe the design of the overshoe could have been a bit better
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Kim

customer_reviews.title: Everyone who owns dress shoes should have a pair of these
customer_reviews.text: I think people have forgotten about overshoes. I like nice shoes and I hate to get them soaked or salty in the inclement weather. These overshoes are great for the rain, snow, salt, etc. The rubber is very thick and durable. They fit snugly over the shoe, as they should. They keep my nicer dress shoes looking great.
customer_reviews.author: BlueRibbon

customer_reviews.title: Seem to work well.
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good...just received these and have used them once in rainy Seattle. They fit well and provide decent traction and protect my shoes well. Thickness of the overshoes seems good and price point seems reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: B to the G

customer_reviews.title: Finally found one to work over mens' sneakers!!
customer_reviews.text: Finally found one for men who have sneakers...fits a big large but works just fine over 10.5D sneakers. Get the 13. Great!!
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: my shoe size is 10 1/2 and reviews say cuts ...
customer_reviews.text: my shoe size is 10 1/2 and reviews say cuts are a little to tight so i got the extra large a little to big, but afraid large might be to small? plus do not want the hassle to return them/
customer_reviews.author: LAWRENCE DORFMAN

customer_reviews.title: size?
customer_reviews.text: I have 13d shoes these were to fit 13-14 shoes. Couldn't get these half way over my shoes. Way too narrow !
customer_reviews.author: CPE

customer_reviews.title: Fits my one pair of 9 1/2 size loafer but ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits my one pair of 9 1/2 size loafer but not another pair. Even that fit feels a bit snug but I have only worn the overshoe a couple of times.
customer_reviews.author: James L. Vendeland

customer_reviews.title: Why doesn't everyone wear these? They're perfect
customer_reviews.text: I swear, once hipsters retire their lumber-jack boots and thei faux-laborer chic, THIS is what they're going to want. Wear any shoes you want and wrap those rascals in these flexible overshoes. Who wants crusty suede? Who want's salt-corroded stitching? Who want's to spend time slathering mink oil all over your shoes? Not me. I'll take these dopey things any day of the week.
customer_reviews.author: S. M. Stelling

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and a waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: They split all the way from front to back. Only got to use them once.
customer_reviews.author: Annie M

customer_reviews.title: Old school galoshes at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Reminds me of my Grampa's galoshes, in a good way. Good outer protection for yer shoes.
customer_reviews.author: k_bock

customer_reviews.title: Good quality rubber over shoe
customer_reviews.text: The rubber over shoe was expensive but made very well. I took the suggestion to go larger, with some hesitation. The rubbers are slightly long for my size 11 dress shoes. I believe that maybe one size smalller than 2XL would be better, except the width now fits very well. The problem is the length is about 1 inch to long. It seems the rubber is made for a very narrow long shoe not a EEE size that I have.
customer_reviews.author: thomas toth

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Tingleys for years..the quality is excellent. These are no different.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond

customer_reviews.title: A good overshoe
customer_reviews.text: Very good rubber overshoes. I ordered 2 sizes and returned one to get it right. Their size Large ("fits size 9 1⁄2 to 11") fit over my size 9 (US) shoes (EUR 43). This model (storm stretch) goes a little higher up on the sides, for better water protection.
customer_reviews.author: shep

customer_reviews.title: First time stretching them on was like putting leather gloves on my hands
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was prompt. Product came as described. First time stretching them on was like putting leather gloves on my hands. I own a sweet pair of handmade leather shoes from Flexible Footwear, and these were like soft covers protecting my nice under shoes. I love these things. And somebody said "gloshes" and I said "you know it, I have come of age!"
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: These are the ones
customer_reviews.text: These are the best, size fits exactly as stated and has made me feel better when walking in the snow in Michigan.
customer_reviews.author: william springstead

customer_reviews.title: This are excellent winter helpers...
customer_reviews.text: I have size 10.5-11 shows and got the size marked 11-13, wore them three times this week, perfect fit and stylish way to keep the winter salt off my dress shoes...
customer_reviews.author: Mike Cummins

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding looks and fit
customer_reviews.text: The overshoes look better than my dress shoes that go inside them! Full coverage and easy on and off but not sloppy. My shoe size is 9 and I ordered the large size based on reading some earlier reviews that said the overshoes run a bit small. I would suggest if you near the margins of size to opt for the larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Storm

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and look
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered Totes because I have always been a loyal customer. However, they were so incorrectly sized I bruised my hand getting them on my shoes. Although the durability was fine I had to wear them all day because if I took them off I would never get back on. The Tingley's are better quality and much better fitting. I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: bhh1020

customer_reviews.title: For size 14 men shoes it works!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for this type of shoes weather protection that would fit comfortable all day for sometime. The Tingley men's storm stretch does the job. My size 14 shoes never felt so good in bad weather. I plan to purchase a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: excatly what i was looing for
customer_reviews.text: i could not find these in any of my local stores. These fit my husband big feet perfectly and they were easy to put over his shoes. he also started that the rubber on the bottom prevented him from slipping in the snow.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

product_meta.title: Tingley Men's Storm Stretch Overshoe
product_meta.description:
Protect your office-ready shoes with the Storm Stretch overshoe from Tingley. The design offers full-coverage protection while the textured sole lends grip for those slick city sidewalks.

Tingley's waterproof overshoes protect your footwear from rain, snow and salt damage. Designed for extra traction on slippery surfaces, the fashionable line fits over virtually every shoe style and size. Made to last, these products are backed by a long history of Tingley Rubber quality and performance.
feature_bullets: Waterproof overshoe stretches to fit over your shoes for protection from rain, snow, and salt damage
